text.7_Chapter, 5_Verse: Because the people have spurned the waters of Shiloah that flow slowly and prefer Rezin and the son of Remaliah
text.52_Chapter, 2_Verse: He was despised and rejected by men--a man of anguish and knowing sickness. As one hiding his face from us, he was despised and we did not value him.
text.52_Chapter, 3_Verse: Yet surely our sicknesses he was carrying. Our pains he was bearing. And we thought of him as smitten, stricken by God and humiliated.
text.52_Chapter, 4_Verse: And he was pierced for our rebellion; he was crushed for our turning aside. The punishment for our perfection was upon him, and in his wounds there is healing for us.
text.52_Chapter, 5_Verse: Each like a sheep, we wandered off--each to his own path turned. And the Lord upon him visited the sin of us all.
text.52_Chapter, 6_Verse: Oppressed, he was humbled, and he did not open his mouth.
